author: TigreCapital
content: @plainview_ he's also wearing a newsboy hat if that helps

author: davidein
content: Crazy round.  I went down to 25k. As the deck remained icy.  Then it turned my way.  And when it turned, it really turned. 170k dinner

author: davidein
content: I flop top set of jacks. The turn is an A.  It get in and I double someone up, when he has AA.

author: davidein
content: 5 hands later flop a set of 9s from the blinds and pay off runner runner flush. 48k

author: davidein
content: Nice solid level.  85k. We will play 1 more hour tonight.

author: davidein
content: All done. 114k.  Try some more starting noon.

author: PhilipEtienne
content: When did Atlanta traffic become LA traffic?

author: PhilipEtienne
content: @vaheelfan at least in LA you can reverse commute at a reasonable pace from DTLA to Pasadena, etc - ATL has gridlock in every direction

author: TigreCapital
content: Seeking alpha has 500k users to leak the information of?

author: PhilipEtienne
content: #tbt to a few months back when Barclay's put a sell on $NVDA @ $30 with a PT of $15, yes, that really happened-they still maintain sell-smdh

author: PhilipEtienne
content: @cirrusdriver fun to discuss commissions this quarter with institutional sales

author: davidein
content: All In with JJ vs QQ. A jack flops! I double up. Living on a borrowed life 170k

author: davidein
content: Extra life is shortish. On fumes. AQ loses to Q7s on an A flop against an eventual flush. 12k.  Time to make a move 😩

author: davidein
content: Out of fumes and out of chips. The fun ends. Time to go home. 😭
